item.title: Athena add a quote by Steven Wright
item.description: "What's another word for thesaurus?" -- Steven Wright

item.title: Athena add a quote by Confucious
item.description: "Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life." -- Confucious

item.title: Athena add a quote by Norman Vincent Peale
item.description: "Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you'll land among the stars." -- Norman Vincent Peale

item.title: Athena add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Out of the huts of history's shame I rise Up from a past that's rooted in pain I rise I'm a black ocean, leaping and wide, Welling and swelling I bear in the tide. Leaving behind nights of terror and fear I rise Into a daybreak that's wondrously clear I rise Bringing the gifts that my ancestors gave, I am the dream and the hope of the slave. I rise I rise I rise." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Athena add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "If Life Gets Too Hard To Stand, Kneel." -- Gordon B. Hinckley

item.title: Athena add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "You can't plow a field simply by turning it over in your mind." -- Gordon B. Hinckley

item.title: Athena add a quote by Nicolas Chamfort
item.description: "A day without laughter is a day wasted." -- Nicolas Chamfort

item.title: Athena add a quote by Walt Disney
item.description: "It's kind of fun to do the impossible." -- Walt Disney

item.title: Athena add a quote by Walt Disney Company
item.description: "Around here, however, we don't look backwards for very long. We keep moving forward, opening up new doors and doing new things, because we're curious...and curiosity keeps leading us down new paths." -- Walt Disney Company

item.title: Athena add a quote by Walt Disney Company
item.description: "The flower that blooms in adversity is the rarest and most beautiful of all." -- Walt Disney Company

item.title: Athena add a quote by Curtis Sittenfeld
item.description: "Perhaps this is how you know you're doing the thing you're intended to: No matter how slow or how slight your progress, you never feel that it's a waste of time." -- Curtis Sittenfeld

item.title: Athena add a quote by Napoleon Bonaparte
item.description: "History is written by the winners." -- Napoleon Bonaparte

item.title: Athena add a quote by Ovid
item.description: "We are ever striving after what is forbidden, and coveting what is denied us." -- Ovid
